Hmm, I don't know, it depends on who I would be hypothetically dating. I wouldn't share a partner with just anyone, you know?

state.text: Well... I'd like to think I can do a fine job with what I know. I'm sure you're aware idols aren't supposed to date, but... {small}Ah, I shouldn't spill too many secrets when other people are around.

Aw, Hilbert is no fun~ I'm not the sort of opponent you should taunt, though, you know... A little motivation goes a long way when you're a curious person....
Aw, Hilbert is no fun~ It's not the wisest move to tease me like that, though... especially when you're already that close to satisfying my curiosity~
(Ahhh, she's looking like a doctor again... the universe is so mean to Eichi-kun, never letting him escape the doctors...)
Thinking about my own state, I... it's starting to feel a little too real I might have to forfeit while you watch, Natsuki-chan. And that's, um...
You're doing better than me, and you might have to watch me while I-- Ah, n-no, never mind that. I'm not really thinking straight right now... I shouldn't act too improper in front of you.
Hmm. Now that we're down to this, it makes you think about what might happen a bit further into the game, doesn't it...
...Ah. I'm really not being very idol-like, am I? I'm sorry you have to see me like that, Natsuki-chan.
Hey, Darkness, you keep saying these things, but... you're actually enjoying this, aren't you? You know, it's okay to admit it. There's nothing wrong with being a filthy pervert sometimes.
Ah, hm, I was a bit heavy-handed, wasn't I... Maybe the game is getting to me. But... you know, I am free after the game, so... that wouldn't be an issue, I mean...
(Oh, um. Now I feel a little awkward...)
Smokers? I think people should be allowed to do whatever they wish, so I don't mind. Well... my lungs do, though, so I'd just ask they don't smoke around me...
Ah, my lungs can get quite annoying if I inhale smoke, so I'd prefer no one do it around me... I find the act sort of... visually appealing, though?
Hmm, am I sensing a bit of a sore spot there...? Fufu, don't worry, I won't press it any further. I guess it must feel awkward, especially if you happen to have feelings for someone in-group...
Well, in yen, that's about the allowance I used to get... so, I guess... not much? Maybe I'd buy a new tea set.
Oh, hm... I may be able to think of someone, but I don't think I should talk about... that person.
I wouldn't want to damage that person's reputation by giving off information in a place like this, but... well, yes, I agree with you.
Ah, hm... I think it depends on what kind of porn you've been looking at, Nanoko-chan. If you try too hard to use it as reference, it might end up poorly... just trust me on this.
Oh, sorry, Nanoko-chan, but it doesn't really replace experience... the opportunities to have said experience, though, may be way closer to you than you'd imagine.
Fufu... I wouldn't say it replaces experience, but it's good to have an idea of what you like, you know... certain people enjoy taking requests very much.

condition.said: A trip to a shopping mall, huh? Hmm... No thanks!

case.state: Awww, no mall trip with Mari-san? That's a shame~ That's okay, though. I don't mind leaving that for another day.
Oh, Nanoko-chan likes anime, right? Hmm, you really do remind me of my underclassmen from when I was still in school...
Ohh, you'll come with me, Mari-san? That's wonderful! I still get lost easily so you might have to guide me, but I'm sure we'll have fun.
Hmmm, catchy songs, especially ones that might get you "in the mood"...? I don't personally have any, but... you might've just given me an idea for a new solo...
Is that so? Well, knowing myself, I might just need it, so I'll rely on you if I suddenly feel like I'll collapse!
Oh, how reliable of you, Mikan-san! It's good to know someone in the table has medical knowledge, means I'll be sure to live to play again~
Hm, what's my least depressing... Oh! There was this one time I was about to get an autograph from an idol I'm a fan of, and I went into cardiac arrest, and...
Bad luck? Oh, well, the former classmates who hate me the most literally own deadly weapons, but if anything, I think that's a bit lucky, maybe I'll die interestingly.
Fufu, alright, then, order as many as you want! Ah, maybe I should get myself one, too? I've never had it.
Eh, you won't help me carry my stuff if I need it? How mean of you, Takatoshi-kun. I didn't think you were the type to pick on sick people.
Oh, is that so? I'm glad I'm not alone! Sometimes I want to keep buying things, just to see them falling off the display...

Ehhh, is it really that strange of a topic? You must not be a regular here then, Yuno-kun. If you had seen what I've seen, you'd understand.
Ufufu that may be true... but, well, while I may not be able to buy alcohol, I'd still love to treat you to something, Mari, so let me know if there's anything you want~

(Oh, is he not good at reading? Hm, maybe I could help him later... I wouldn't want to embarrass him by pointing it out, though, he's far too cute for that.)
That's true! Ufufu, I'm sure my answer to that won't be so interesting, though... I'm just from Japan, not too far away from Tokyo, and I live in the Ensquare dorms. That's about it .
Hmmm, Kazuma-kun is quite confident today, isn't he? Well, I'll take you up on your offer, then. But I'll have you know I won't be easy to defeat~
Eeh, Kazuma-kun wants to make a bet? That sounds interesting, I'm in! I'll be doing my best, though, just so you know~
Ah, really, Blake? You might have to act as my tour guide, since I'm still not used to malls... but I'm sure we could have fun together~!
Well, I suppose I am too used to the comfort my lifestyle allows me... it'd be difficult if I had to move around so much, honestly, with the way my body is...
Believe it or not, I feel the same, Blake. It was plenty of work to get where I am, and while I've definitely made a lot of mistakes... I would like to keep performing, you know?
Oh, you have a compression glove? I understand the feeling a bit, though in my case, it's compression socks, sometimes. I don't really have good ankle joints...

Ah, n-no, I don't think I have any... it's not weird if I want to... b-be humiliated in front of others or-- have them call me disgusting and-- {small}um, or having them... c-choke me, or threaten me, or...
(Anatolyyyy, why are you so cute?)
Hmmm, Darkness has taken a liking to Nagatoro-chan, hasn't she? Somehow, that's not surprising at all~
Ufufu, I'm happy to hear Blake is enjoying the view... ♡ Look as much as you want, okay? That's what I'm here for... unless you want more later, that is~
I was wondering the same, Nagisa-chan. Maybe we'll bring out futons or mattresses later? I've only ever had sleepovers with one person, so I wouldn't know...
Oh, a school trip? I hope you've been having fun! I'm not from here either, but I'm just traveling alone. I'm happy to have gotten a few days off~
Well, that's actually a good way to describe it.. I know it may not be groundbreaking... but what matters to me is that I create something that can make people smile.
Oh... Mari-san is really bold, isn't she? It's always wonderful to meet girls like you~ {small}And I'm happy to be understood...~
Fufu, we think alike, don't we, Mari-san? Sometimes you just can't help but do it if it's so exciting...
Oh? I could've sworn you were throwing, with that face you were making... you really think people aren't noticing your panting, Darkness? Everyone can hear it.
Ufufu, you're looking forward to it, aren't you? You know, you should get in the middle of the circle then, so everybody can get a good look. You'll get there soon, I'm sure.
Awww, come on, Darkness, that's such a rude thing to say about someone when you came here to put yourself on display... fufu, are you acting out so you'll be punished?
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
Fufu, I'm sorry about that, Nanoko-chan... but you know, it's not so scary when you actually get to do it. As long as you and your partner are honest with each other...
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
Eh, another universe? That should only be possible if you die, yes? I'm not well versed in afterlife myths myself, though. I don't have any particular beliefs either.
Siblings, huh... I suppose I'd like to have one, but, well, I wouldn't really want them to have those kinds of genetics. I suppose in a different world, though...
Well, Hilbert, I've had my own share of hardships, though I guess they're different from yours... Life just makes you realize these kinds of things, doesn't it?

Hmmm, I'm not sure if you're into idol music, Sakura-san, but if you are, I have quite a few recommendations! Oh, I could even show them to you in my phone, I have Spotify Premium so it wouldn't be an issue, and I downloaded all the albums so even if we don't have signal here it shouldn't be a problem, even if there are some wonderful albums that aren't up for streaming yet, but I do know how to find these too so just say the word if you want to hear them! If you tell me what genre you prefer I could also guess which unit would be more to your liking, and then we should--
Oh, I'm okay! It's just that you... kind of look like a medical doctor, with your coat. I get the feeling you're going to scold me for playing a game that's "bad for my health" and such...
Hmm? I don't think I know what a Gallade is, but... Hilbert, don't you think they may mean that as a compliment? It's not like curves are a bad look on anyone...

You do have wider hips, but I honestly think they give you a quite handsome figure~ Curvier guys are... how do people where you're from say it... like a "shiny Pokemon"? {small}I don't know the language well...
Well, I'm usually driven around by one of my family's personal drivers. It's not my preferred method, though, just the most common. I like driving by myself, but it tires me out~
Loyalty, hm... I find it a very desirable trait. I guess in a romantic context it sounds even more appealing, but loyal friends are also something to be sought after, right?
I would like advice on getting less sleep... I'm not even that much of a heavy sleeper, but if I'm tired enough, I can and will end up falling asleep just about anywhere...
Ehhh, a child? I feel too young to think about that... I wouldn't want to pass on my genes to them, that much I know. But maybe I'd adopt, if I retired...
Fufu, from the male perspective, I don't think you really need to try, Jura... you seem like the dream girl of quite a few guys I know.
Shh, Nagatoro-chan, don't mention it too much or one my butlers might show up to get me out of here! But I'll be fine~ what's life without a little risk anyway?
Ehhh, too much of a romantic for something like that, then? I respect that. Fufu, I should have expected it, probably, you look a bit like the type...~
Oh, it's nothing contagious, but all mostly chronic, respiratory-cardiovascular stuff-- It's boring to talk about, but don't worry. I have the resources to take care of myself~
Well, isn't high school a turbulent time for everyone? Fufu, maybe I'm just used to my colleagues' love-hate relationship with Yumenosaki...
Hmmm? Well, idols aren't supposed to date, so pretty much all my friends are single... But you're just a little older than me, right? Isn't it too early to overthink this kind of stuff?
Hmm, am I sensing a bit of a sore spot there...? Fufu, don't worry, I won't press it any further. I guess it must feel awkward, especially if you happen to have feelings for someone in-group...
Ah... I bet I look much lamer than I did when we were just starting the game, but... I'm not sure how well I can even focus on it, at this point...
Natsuki-chan... you're kind of unfair, you know. I must look so uncool to you now that I feel... shyer, almost.
Fufu, well, you're right that it suits your look well. Though... I wouldn't say you look any less cute without it, if I'm being honest.
Well, it's good to take pride in your own size, ~okino~. I think being small is rather cute... and if I may be bold, when you're next to someone bigger, you just look even cuter.
Oh my, ~human~ works in the idol industry? I had no idea! And you're in it too... you'll have to show me some samples of your work later, Noire!
A... goddess, and ~human~ was in charge of giving you advice. My, I'm not sure if I can keep up-- I'm glad that ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ could help you, though~

Oh, so ~human~ is your secretary? Fufu, that's kind of cute to imagine... and quite bold of ~human.ifMale(him|her)~ if ~human.ifMale(he|she)~'s bringing ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ boss to play strip poker~ I didn't know you had that in you, ~human~.
Oh, so you're a... My, that's a lot of information, Noire~ Ah, should I refer to you in a specific way, then? I'd hate to accidentally disrespect a goddess...
Pizza toppings? I don't get to eat it often, but I did try it with prosciutto once, that was really good~
(Fufu, maybe I am being a bit meaner than usual, but there are some types of people I just can't resist to tease...)
Ah, well, I know inviting someone to do anything here makes it look like you have second intentions, but... You know, sometimes you really do just want to hang out. I think you get it.

state.text: I have to admit... though I'm quite good at poker, playing at the Inventory always has its way of making me lose my focus.
Hmmm, this is a bit troublesome. I want to be able to tease everyone for losing too, but... fufu, you're not making it easy for me to focus either~
Fufu, come on, everyone, don't you want to try a little harder? I'll be watching you all forfeit in the next round at this rate.
Hmmm. I thought this game would be much more challenging, but as it turns out...

case.state: Ah, I did ramble quite a bit at you all, didn't I? Don't mind me. I'm like an old man when it comes to some of my life stories, fufu... But don't worry, I won't bore you any more~
...But I'm sure you're all good, trustworthy folk, so! And the game is far more interesting than any of my silly stories, anyway, so let's just keep playing~
Ah, I did ramble quite a bit at you all, didn't I? Don't mind me. I'm like an old man when it comes to some of my life stories, fufu... But don't worry, I won't bore you any more~
What happened backstage during that time didn't go public... And it's better this way. It's a lot of interpersonal drama, you know? Idols-in-training are... very passionate.
I suppose I was a bit of a tyrant... but I'm sure you understand, it was frustrating to see how many people then didn't take idolhood seriously. It's okay if I'm hated for it.
Talking about my old grudges isn't something wise to do as an idol. But I trust you all to not spread rumors, yes? I'm willing to do a lot for the sake of my career, you see...
Ah, is it hard to imagine me as someone who people have grudges against? I do try to be polite, but I'm only human... and I don't make compromises when it comes to my career.
(Well, I can't tell if they know me, but either way, if rumors spread about me, it shouldn't be difficult to fix the situation.)

(Eh, if ~celebrity~ is here as well, isn't ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~... but if ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~ spreads rumors about me, wouldn't that be outing ~celebrity.ifMale(himself|herself)~ as a player too?)
You know, I'm really not mad you ended up taking my tie. You look adorable with it, like I've left a mark of myself on you~
~serious~... I'm sorry, but I can't help but wonder, are you sure you're at the right place? You know what game we're playing here, right?
Ah, I realize my ranting might seem a little hard to understand if you're not in the scene-- But don't worry, it's nothing shady, fine is my idol unit, and Starmaker is the production company~
Oh, I mentioned Keito, didn't I? I was trying not to name names... well, he's my childhood friend, and we met at his family's temple during my grandfather's funeral.
Eh, I guess I look kind of morbid talking about death so casually, huh? I promise I'm okay now~ I just picked up a habit from the rest of my family, since we're all sickly...
It's a complicated story, you know. Sometimes I wish I had been more easygoing back then-- But making sure idols continue to improve will always be the most important thing to me...
Oh, wait, is that the cardigan I gave you? I'm happy you liked it, ~human~~ I asked my friend to help me pick it, you know? She owns one that looks just like it.
Oh, is that the cardigan I gifted you? Of course, I'm happy you like it...! Looking at you now, though, I'm almost surprised... I feel lucky that it actually suited your style.
And yes, they were proper, dramatic grudges. Let's say some idols are quite... reactive when you take something, or someone, away from them... {small}Ah, but that's gossipy, so I'll stop here.
Ah, um, I forgot I must ask...! Are there any pictures or videos of me being taken?
I can tell you, though, I've actually done a lot as a student council president. My school had a poor reputation up until my second year. It was one of my plans to... improve it.
Psst..., Number One, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
Aah, Franchouchou is truly amazing... the first time I heard their music, I felt like it could bring me back to life if I died right there!
(Hmm, I wonder if news of fine have spread to Saga... I want to ask Number One if she's heard about me, but I'd hate to seem conceited...)
Oh, Num... I mean, Sakura-san, would you perhaps like to meet up someday, after this? You know, since we're in the same industry, I'd love to hear your perspectives on...
Psst..., Miku-san, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
I can't believe I'm actually playing a game with Hatsune Miku... ah, even if it's somewhat of a strange one, it feels like my wildest dreams just came true!
(Ahhh, I wonder if Miku-san has ever heard of me... I know she's not exactly like a human idol but, even then... I don't want to seem conceited so I won't ask, though.)
Set a trap now in your ordinary love, leaving no footprints around the cracks in your defenses ♫ ...Cantarella is still one of my favorite songs, you know. I've even covered it!
I want to run away like Juliet, but please don't call me by that name ♫ ...fufu, Romeo and Cinderella is always stuck in my head, it was my favorite song to cover~
Hm... maybe I shouldn't be asking a question like this, but... don't any of you think embarrassment feels... kind of good, sometimes?
I feel like this is an embarrassing question, but... well, we're all playing strip poker here, at least one of you must feel like... the exposure is sort of a pleasurable thrill, right?
...you know, I'm often scolded for doing things like that, but it's just natural to feel excited when you're doing something risky, isn't it?
I'm a huge fan of Franchouchou, you know... their music is truly amazing, the first time I heard I felt like it could bring someone back to life!
(Hmm, I wonder if news of fine have spread to Saga... I want to ask Number One if she's heard about me, but I'd hate to seem conceited...)
Num... um, Nikaido-san, you seem to know quite a lot about Franchouchou, and I just happen to be a big fan. Would you maybe like to chat after this?
Hmm, Saki-san, since we're both fans of Franchouchou, do you think that perhaps we'll see each other in their next concert?
(Ah, I get to meet another idol... and I'm looking so indecent in front of her, but somehow it's so... exciting...)
Um... ~idol~, please keep my secret safe, will you? If you want compensation for it, well...
I'm definitely not idol-like now, but, ah...
Ah, ~idol~, it's... so bold of you, you know. Showing yourself... like that...
~idol~, you're really being so, so... a-ah, but don't worry, your secret will be safe with me.
Oh, ~idol~, t-thank you... for the wonderful performance. I can only hope I'll... match up to you, one day.
*cough* {small}Ah, don't worry about me, this just happens.
Well, since we're at this point of the game, I hope you don't mind me asking... Do any of you come here often? I promise I won't judge if you say yes~
Ah, so many of us are getting so... exposed. I hope that being seen isn't making anybody too uncomfortable...
Fufu... With so many of us being so underdressed, the game should be coming to an end soon, huh... I wonder who will be our victor.
How does it feel for the rest of you, to be seen exposed like this? I know it's quite embarrassing for some people, but, well...
You know... We are still in a public space, someone could catch sight of us like this... Ah, I'm not sure how to feel about it myself... yet.
Fufu, does the thought that someone might see us doing this... make any of you feel something? Even embarrassment...
The Inventory really isn't like anything else in this world... To enable us to do something like this, where anyone could se...
Ufufu, I'm rather undressed, but that shouldn't distract you too much, right, ~serious~? Since you're so serious and proper~
Oooh? Did I just catch ~serious~ staring at me? Oh, my, I wouldn't have expected you to be so bold...
Is... ~serious~ really pent up, after all? Hmmm, is that what hides behind such a severe face?
~serious~... you're giving us quite an eyeful, how does that make you feel?
~serious~, if I stare too much, are you going to scold me? I can't help but wonder...
Doing okay over there, ~serious~? Fufu, I just wonder how that exposure feels to you...
Hmmm, you've lost quite a few hands, haven't you, ~mean~? You need to be more careful, you might be getting distracted.
Is everything okay, ~mean~? Are you feeling a little embarrassed, perhaps?
Fufufu, did I just see you angrily looking at me, ~mean~? You know words won't hurt me, so just say whatever's on your mind~
Eh, ~serious~ seems so proper, it's honestly hard to believe you'd be playing a game like this.
Hey, ~serious~, you know what the rules of this game are, yes? Are you really willing to strip, and even...forfeit, in front of all these people?
I can't help but think, ~serious~, for you to come to a place like this, it must be some sort of drastic measure. I wonder if you're pent up...
...Make sure to keep the camera away from me, of course!
Hmmm? Did I just see you pointing that camera at me, ~camera~?
Don't forget I've got my eyes on you, ~camera~.
Oh, after we're done with the game, would anyone perhaps like to accompany me to a trip to a shopping mall? I've somewhat recently been to one for the first time, it's really fun!
I'm curious, do any of you happen to use vending machines often? I didn't even know how they worked until my third year at school. Is that really so strange?
You know, sometimes I do wonder how people who don't own cars or have drivers manage to go places so quickly. Public transport seems so inefficient to me...
This game really is quite strange, you see some things here you'd think were only possible in fiction... fufu, I wonder if maybe I've just died and this is what the afterlife is like.
Don't you all agree the Inventory is really strange? I've seen things that made me wonder if I've actually died and this is just the afterlife... Does anyone feel the same?
Eh, ~mean~ is so mean... we're just here to have fun, aren't we? Hm, maybe you're trying to cover up that you're embarrassed...
You know, ~mean~, you can keep hurling your insults here and there, but I'm not quite so intimidated for you. I may have a fragile body, but it takes plenty to break my mind...~
You know, ~mean~, I can't help but wonder what you'll do if you lose... would that bravado of yours be gone, or would it stay? I'm excited to find out, I must admit.
Being in and out of hospitals all the time really is so boring. It's great to be able to just relax and play a game like this! Ah, I do hope none of you relate to this statement, though.
You know, I'm actually not supposed to be here at all, I just got out of a rather bad health week, but after being so... inactive, I kind of just needed to do something different, you know.
You know, sometimes things get so strange at the Inventory, I'll just start expecting to wake up at the hospital soon, with more morphine than blood in my system...
Ah, I'm having fun, of course, but... I have to say, having ~idol~ here makes this feel so surreal~
I really should try my best, I don't want you to get a bad impression from me, ~idol~... But, then again, to make another idol strip in front of others...
Oh, I hope you're having fun, ~idol~! The thought of scandals is always in the back of your mind when you have this job, but... I'll make sure neither of us gets into trouble~
(I, ah... can't stop wondering if there's even more people watching me play this... since we're in public...)

state.text: Of course, it's strip poker, I knew what I was getting into, b-but doing it in a public place like that...
(D-Did I just see someone staring at me from the distance? How...dangerous... )
It feels... quite hot here, for some reason...

case.state: You know, sometimes people tell me that I talk too much, but I've never really seen a problem with that? Isn't it better to speak your mind than to just keep everything inside? Even if you're just rambling, something that just seems to be an insignificant thought to you can turn into a wonderful idea when you share it with someone... Well, it's also true that most people don't interrupt me when I end up going into tangents, but even just talking to yourself can be good to sort out your own thoughts, right? I know that I have been able to put loose ideas together from talking to myself like this, but people will still say that--
My, my... this has to be Keito's spirit haunting me for sneaking off to do something like this, and at an office, no less...
You know, I wonder who this office belongs to. If my luck says anything, is that whoever it is isn't very happy with me now...
(This hand... what does it even mean? All I can feel is myself burning up from all the staring...)
(I-I... hope I lose this round, I feel so...)
Mmh... Let me lose already...
(Fufu, like I wanted to come here and do anything but spread my legs and touch myself in front of a bunch of people...)
I must be honest, this... venue, isn't really somewhere I'm very comfortable in. It's making it a bit difficult to focus.
Ah, I'm definitely still not used to playing at a venue like this... But I'm open for new experiences, of course.
I can't help but wonder... is this the back of one of the establishments owned by the Inventory, or just... a random place? The former option is a bit...
The heat really is unforgiving here, isn't it... hm, is it against the rules for the players to have a drink of water, or...?
It's really hot, isn't it... is the universe perhaps trying to encourage me to lose?
The hot air definitely doesn't make it any easier to focus, honestly...
Fufu, don't you all feel a bit like the world is tempting you into losing rounds, now? It's just rather hot...
In a way, I'm glad I've lost a few rounds and got rid of the extra layers... but on the other side, fufu...
Honestly, being here for a while has made me a bit sweaty... Fufu, I sure hope it's not making my shirt see-through, or anything like that...
Sometimes, I wonder how the Inventory manages to hold games at so many different venues... of course, I'm not complaining about it, just curious.
I wonder why you all decided to join this table. You know, the possibility of being exposed in public is real... most people are quite embarrassed by that.
Ah, I'm quite enjoying... the breeze here.
Oh, now that I think about it, I wonder if there's anyone looking at us from a distance...
Ah, this game always makes my heart race... no matter what, you can't deny it's thrilling, huh? Well, some games are more than others...
Do they serve tea here, by any chance? They might not have my favorite blends, but I’m open to new experiences. It’s why I came here in the first place.
Is anyone hungry? Feel free to order whatever menu items you'd like, I'll gladly cover the tab if anyone wishes, too!
I’ve played plenty of poker before, so if anyone is having trouble, don’t be afraid to rely on me for tips~
This is the most thrilling version of poker, don’t you agree? Ah, if only I could have brought Keito along with me... I think he could use some loosening up.
Let’s keep doing our best, everyone. Even if you're quite underdressed there’s always a chance you could still win… if you want to.
(I wonder if Wataru would ever be willing to join a game like this… he’s so unpredictable, I feel like he’d say yes but disappear in a flock of doves the first time he lost…)
Maybe I shouldn't come back here so often, but it's just too much fun every time...
Fufu… this game is making my heart race, if I’m being honest… if anything bad happens to me, you all will have to take responsibility.
Hey, ~human~, if you're so fond of looking at me, you should just go look up "Eichi Tenshouin merchandise"~
...such a dangerous game...
Ah, my breathing is quite fast, maybe I should... sit down...
Ehhh, I wish I could order a drink here... but my 20th is still a good few months away~ Well, actually, that's the drinking age in Japan, and the Inventory is weird, so, maybe...
Ehhh, I wish I could order a drink here... Aah, my 20th is close, but it still feels such a long wait~ Well, actually, that's the drinking age in Japan, and the Inventory is weird, so, maybe...
Oh, by the way, ~lonely~, may you tell me when you're free? I'd love to spend some time with you, maybe we could go to a café...
Oh, ~lonely~, are you doing anything after this? Fufu, don't worry, it's nothing weird, I was just looking for someone to get some food with.
ai drop for when hes horny over mari
ai drop for when hes REALLY horny over mari
ai dropping for when hes horny over natsuki
ai dropping for when hes REALLY horny over natsuki
Aw, you guys still stood your ground even though I told you to fold? I guess you're more determined than I think...
Fufu, you really couldn't believe me even though I mentioned Miss Lady Luck herself? Well, I guess I was a little too over the top...
Aw, come on, I spoke so confidently~ I really thought you were going to believe me...

state.text: Eh-- what? I'm the first one to strip? Now that's unexpected... Well, I suppose I don't mind... doing the honors...
Ehhh, do I look like I'd ever do something like that~? How mean of you, Mari...
Oh, Mari, I'll do my very best... I'd hate to disappoint you, after all~
Ufufu, I think you know I just couldn't possibly leave you alone here... I'll happily stand on stage alongside you, Mari ♡

case.state: Ah, well... when I was in school, I learned to memorize things by just watching them, so I don't actually practice much. So when I am on stage, I'm usually well enough to do it.
A-Ah, you didn't know about it...? Well, yes, it's a bit of a new scene. My group's official debut was-- {small}Ah, you're probably not interested in that, right...?
Fufu... I know, hearing someone in my position sounds a bit like... fanservice, doesn't it? But, you know, Natsuki-chan... I do come here specifically to have a break from work....
Aw, just what are you thinking about me, Natsuki-chan? I wouldn't rush into that part of the game like this...
Into it... that's really a bold claim to make... I wonder what makes you think that, Mari-san.

condition.saying: Eichi, do you find it hard to avoid being recognized in public?

case.state: Oh, it's happened to me before as well~ Though, I guess that being driven around in eye-catching cars doesn't help my case. I keep saying we should have something more discreet for daily life, and yet...
Hm? Ah, well, I guess you could say that, Cheryl. I've even rambled about it and everything...
Aw, you flatter me, Yuno-kun. Consider me being there your pass already, I'm just happy to meet new people, you know.
Oh, they haven't? Hm, I suppose it's not surprising, if you don't live in Japan.... I don't mind if you call me Eichi-kun either, that's how most of my friends call... called me, anyway.
Fufu, is that so, Blake...? I wonder what about me gives off that impression. But I'm happy to hear you feel more comfortable around me, I hope we can get along~
Ah, is that so, Takatoshi-kun...? Well... perhaps I could help, then? It wouldn't be an issue at all.
Eh, really? I'll have plenty to teach you about male idols then, Takatoshi-kun. It's a much more complex job than you'd think.
Oh~? How so, Natsuki-chan?
(Hmmm, is she staring? I wonder if she's a fan...)
Fufu, sorry, Natsuki-chan, I have a habit of wearing a lot of clothing. Be just a little more patient for me, okay?
Oh, I don't mean to tease Natsuki-chan~ I just usually dress like this. I'll be sure to make it up for you next time, okay?
My parents? No way. You see, I've just been hospitalized a lot, and idol media was my main comfort, so I wanted to do something like that too. Being able to make others smile, and all...
Fufu... me? Well, if I am here, I'm not repulsed by that, nor am I too shy... but saying I'm... "into it," that's a bold claim.
Hmmm, you think I'm pretty? I'm flattered. Fufu, I wonder what makes you assume something like that about me, though~
Hmm, you've recognized me? I supposed there's no way to deny that... I am an idol, yes, why do you ask?
Fufu, you got close, my 20th is still in a few months... I'm a recent graduate too, so we're really not that far apart, Natsuki-chan. I must only be about a year and a half older than you.

condition.saying: So, Eichi-san, could you tell me more about your idol troupe?

case.state: Ah, you're interested in us? I'm honored~ We're called fine, as in the Italian word for ending. We borrow a bit from classical music, so... Oh, I can get you a ticket if you want to see us live!
Ah, well, I have a couple health issues, most of my family does, but... it's nothing that makes strip poker unsafe, fufu. Well, unless someone particularly cute strips... just kidding~
Oh, you could say I am, yes. Fufu, are you curious about how I sound like? I wouldn't want to disrupt the game, but maybe I could give you a bit of a private performance later~
Fufu, yes, I'm grateful for all the attention my fans give me, but... I can't deny it's good to have a break. So you're known in your place of origin as well, Mr. Dunban?
Well, even people from Earth are surprised about the concept of male idols sometimes, so I can't blame you. I assume there isn't much men in Mejarian media in general?
Ah, my condition is almost entirely genetic. I'm not contagious either. Most people really are far sturdier... You might've just gotten unlucky enough to meet the weakest ones first.
Fufu, it's that visible, isn't it? Nagatoro-chan is an athlete, though, the competition wouldn't be fair~ I might dance, but I can't do much of anything else...

state.text: Hmmm, me? I do find the game fun, but that's such a bold claim, you know, Nagatoro-chan. I wonder where you're getting that idea from~

case.state: Eh? That's... somehow quite flattering to hear. There are plenty of guys like me, actually. Maybe I could introduce you to them? It depends on what your type for personality is.
Oh, you're sweet, but there's no need to worry, I've always dealt with sickness, and at the moment I'm feeling quite alright. Maybe even better, after you asked me.
Eh? Plants can-- Ah, um, I don't think that's a good option for me, though. My condition is kind of... and money isn't an issue... But you're really a kind person, huh? Offering help like that~
Oh my, have I been found out? And here I thought I was being sneaky~ I do lead my own idol group, yes, I'm honored that you even thought I might be familiar!
Oh, so that time has come for me, hm... now I'm kind of nervous, knowing I'll have to do it with Natsuki-chan here...
A-Ah, I do blush quite easily, huh? It's okay, I don't feel... unwell, or strange, or anything. It's just always been this way.
Eh, does Okino-chan know me? Well, that's not exactly surprising, I guess... Are you an idol fan? I do hope you keep it a secret that I'm an irresponsible celebrity, though...~
Fufu, you make it sound almost flattering that I'm taking part in this game... I guess it has taught me a bit more about myself, but when I think about it... it's nothing that surprises me.
Ehh, I'm being praised for coming to a place like this? Well, I won't complain about that... I guess I've learned a thing or two, but they're all things I probably should've known already.
Aw, you flatter me, Nami... it's not surprising you don't recognize me if you're not into the idol scene. And, well, maybe I'm mentioned on articles about my family's business, but...
Oh, is anything wrong, Miku-san? You seem a bit uncomfortable. Is the game overwhelming you, perhaps? Oh, I hope I wasn't the one to put you off...
Oh, the story isn't all that interesting~ I heard a colleague from another company mention it, then I looked it up online...
Ah... I supposed not, huh? But... I've gotten so far, of course I wouldn't just back down now. I wouldn't have gotten anywhere as an idol if I acted like this~
Hmm? Do you think so, Cheryl? I've never thought about dying my hair. But since you mentioned it, I wonder how I'd look~
Hm? Ah, well, I guess you could say that, Cheryl. Does it show on my face too much? Being an idol can be quite stressful...
I can understand that. We all experience art in different ways, after all. Being in the entertainment industry will introduce you to all sorts of genres...
Hmm? You, annoying me? No way~ Fufu, don't you think I would be honored to have my hair ruffled by someone who's even cuter?
Hm? Yes, I guess I could say I do have quite a few fans... why?
Hm? Yes, there are quite some people who enjoy my work... why?
Adorable? Well, I'm flattered you think of me that way... I don't even stand out that much~
Eh, adorable? You'll make me blush. I feel lucky that I happened to catch your eye~
I... um, I promise I'm not... losing on purpose at all...
Huh, what is... I lost again? There's... no way...
A-Am I just... completely unable to pay attention to anything, now?
Ah, yet another loss...? My, that's... unlikely, I'm not sure what's going on...
Oh, hm... this really is a streak of bad luck, huh? I hope I can bounce back...
E-Eh? I'm just... continuing to lose... somehow. That's unexpected...
Hmmm, I guess I have no choice but to strip... Fufu, it would be rude to not honor our fellow players' efforts, wouldn't it?

state.text: Well, I lost. Are there are specific requests the audience would like to make? Aah, that made me sound like a stripper, but I suppose I am one now...

case.state: Ehh, I'm the first to lose? I wasn't expecting that... But I guess that's one of the reasons this game is so fun, right?
My turn, huh? I guess I should have expected that, with a hand like this~
Aw, well... it's not like I wasn't expecting to lose, at least a little bit.
Ah, um, my last layer has to... well, it's okay. It's been feeling... much tighter, anyway.
I... guess there's no way to escape from that. You've been defeating me fairly, s-so...
Oh, my first defeat? Well, that's a shame... but rules are rules, aren't they?
Aw, it's my turn again? And just when I was thinking I was getting the hang of the game...
O-Oh, I lost. Well... at this point, I don't really have many options, do I? I wonder if anyone is enjoying this...
Oh no, I lost~ Whatever shall I do...
Hmmm, I suppose it's fair I must strip now. I've been avoiding it for quite a few rounds, huh?
Hmmm, seeing my socks and more of my neck wasn't enough? You want me to show even more? Geez, you guys are kind of perverts, aren't you...
My, my... I've lost again, and now there's no more stalling with my smaller pieces, huh... I wonder where this will go.
Aw, I'll have to strip again? How embarrassing~
Oh, ~player~, are you excited to watch me strip? Then, by all means, watch my every move...
Oh, it's my turn, hm... you might be surprised to hear that, but I'm actually conflicted about what I should take off now.
Oh, my winning streak is over? Aw, well, I guess rules are rules...
Oh, it's my turn, hmm... I guess it's fair. Fufu, I hope it's not too frustrating that I'm ahead of everyone~
Well, my turn had to come at one point, didn't it?
Aw, there goes another piece of mine... But we're just starting out, so I'm not too worried~
Hmmm, my turn? Well, I wonder what I should go for now...
Fufu... And I'm down to one small piece left, hm?
Oh... I suppose I wouldn't be able to run from that, anyway...
Fufu, and it's my turn again... I'm wondering just how my... audience interest is looking like.
Oh. Here comes the end of the road...~
Fufu, even if I keep losing, I don't mind. The most important thing is to have fun, isn't it?
Hmmm, I'm not doing too well at the game, am I... But it's okay, the most important thing is to have fun, anyway~
Wait, am I, ah... the most undressed person here? {small}And I'm about to become even more undressed...
Wait, am I, ah... the most undressed person here? {small}And I'm about to become even more undressed...
...but, well, I had already decided I was going to take off my sweater now, so that was just a joke! Maybe think about what you'd like to see next round, if you can defeat me then.
Eh, is that so? My, I can only wonder what was the circumstance of you two's meeting, then. Just what does ~human~ get up to when I don't have my eyes on ~human.ifMale(him|her)~?
Eh, is that so? My, I can only wonder what was the circumstance of you two's meeting, then. I guess it is always the quiet ones who end up being like this...

state.text: (Eh...? I seem like...?) I don't know what you're talking about, M-Mari... I may attend these sorts of games, but I still... do my best to act proper...

case.state: Ehh, do you think so? You're praising me so sincerely, I might blush~ I've always just thought of it in "it is what it is" terms, really, never as something to be proud of...
It honestly feels a bit embarrassing that I can't work as hard as my peers sometimes... Fufu, but if you say so, then I can't help but feel a little proud...
Ehh, really? Sounds like they're close friends, or pretty easygoing people, or teasing upperclassmen... or like they're flirting with you.
It sounds so embarrassing when you say it like that, though~ A lot of guys are like that, you know? It's hard to focus when there's such a cute girl talking to you...
Hmm, that is fair, I suppose... But, somehow, I can't help but feel a little flattered that you were. I think I'll hold on to that feeling...
Oh, I am, yes! Hmm, I feel just an explanation wouldn't be enough to describe what I do, so, perhaps I should get you tickets for my next live?
Oh, I've actually already graduated. I thought it'd be fun to wear the uniform again, is all. Fufu, don't worry, doctor, I've always been a good boy when it came to school~
I wonder why you'd think that's emasculating, though, plenty of my colleagues are actually quite manly. Just what sort of impression are you getting from me, hm?
Oh? Thank you very much, that's kind of you, Natsuki-chan. Let me know if I can do anything for you in return~
Hmmm~? Fufu, that's flattering to hear from a beautiful girl like Natsuki-chan... I can't make many promises on the strength part, but I'm slowly getting better at it too.
Ufu, I'm on it, Natsuki-chan... I do hope I don't disappoint~

state.text: I'm working right on it, Mari, no need to be impatient~ isn't it best when you take your time, anyway? If you win, you'll still get to see all of me, in the end... ♡
Hmmm, are you~? Well, I'm a performer, as you've said, I'm aiming to make my audience happy... but you'll still have to defeat me to be able to see more, fufu... ♡

case.state: Ehh~? You're getting a strange look on your face... I wonder what sort of thing you're thinking about...
{small}Natsuki-chan p-picking me up and...{!reset} ah, um, well, I guess you're not fully wrong... I really may be a bit of a "softie"... and I may be tall but I'm not very strong, fufu...
I would say we're still in the same range, myself... Ah, that's why I'm acting more familiar too. But feel free to tell me to back off if you want.
Well, when I come here, I'm never in a rush for anything... so it's natural to stay a bit longer sometimes, right? It can't be helped if you have especially good company...
Oh, I've already graduated, actually, I'm just dressed like this for fun. I went to Yumenosaki, though, which is a school specialized in training idols.
Oh? You even know my production company? Ah, how can I play normally, when Number One of Franchouchou knows about me~?
It's a little embarrassing to have it pointed out like that, though~ Fufu, were you staring at me before? Or is it just that noticeable?
{small}You can read my--?{!reset} ...Ah, you're trying to catch me off guard, aren't you? Even if you're supernatural, I don't remember you mentioning an ability like this...
As cute as me? Oh, my, you're going to make me blush~ Especially when that's being said by the one who's clearly the cutest between the two of us...

Ehh, I still think it's a kind offer, though~ It won't work for me because I'm just hopeless when it comes to health... But does it work properly for you? Maybe you're just good with herbal medicine, though...
Ah, I can't help it, though... I know I might come off as shameless and such sometimes, but... um... {small}It's kind of-- No, pretty embarrassing...
So you know me through my family? I guess it's not surprising either, especially if you're a student... I guess it makes sense that someone that smart-looking would be studying that...
If I've done anything wrong, don't be afraid to tell me, yes? I won't take any offense. I know I can get a bit... intense, around other idols. Some of my colleagues have said it's strange, too...
I thought it'd be a really shady place, but it's surprisingly popular? A lot of idols come here too... How did you find out about it yourself?
Hmm, do you think so, Nagatoro-chan? Fufu, it's a bit of a broad assumption, don't you think? I guess you could be right about most cases, though...
Fufu, you have a type, don't you... I hope I'm still somewhat easy on the eyes even if I don't fit it~
Fufu, you definitely know what you like... Sadly, my image as an idol is the opposite of that, but you make me interested in trying out the look.
But, well... I'm honestly not a good person to come for if you want advice on that. You can't change the past you, know? So, I just try to think more about the future instead.
Hmm... My answer to this will probably disappoint you, but I really don't do much. You can't change what already happened, so focus on what's to come instead.

I do actually enjoy this sort of music too, believe it or not. But for my own work, I have a different goal... Something about making cheerful music to take people's minds off their problems for a bit.
I guess I'm a little too tall, but I don't mind having to lean down~ You're quite sweet anyway, and I haven't seen anyone like you before, so do feel free to "annoy" me.
Oh, well, I can't say I'm not happy that I'm admired. But it has its shortcomings, you know.
Oh, well, of course I'm extremely grateful for all those people. But being a public figure comes with its own struggles...
I was avoiding it, but I guess I'll have to part with my socks after all... well, maybe I'll keep them on, next time? I know some people might like the "socks, garters, and nothing else" look...
Ah, since we're at this point, I guess I shouldn't bother to be proper anymore... well, I was really looking forward to do this, so please enjoy all of me...~
Well... I guess I'll go for the shoes, now. Wouldn't it be strange to just keep them on until the end of the game? Though, I guess some people are into that...
I guess I'll go for the tie. This is the third year one, where I studied... I honestly liked the first and second year ones best, though. The red and blue looked nicer with this sweater vest.
W...Well, I'm proud of my legs, at least. Besides, it wasn't like this wouldn't happen sooner or later...
Well, there we go. A bigger item coming off... does that make you want to watch me more?
Ah, I was avoiding it, but I suppose I have to part with my socks after all... the floor seems cold~
Ah, here we go... I'm... okay with taking off my shirt, really, but I have to confess it still makes me a little nervous... when I'm being looked at by people like this...
I've done bromide photoshoots before, you know. It's not like I'm a stranger to exposing my chest...
Fufu, it's visible I've become a little nervous now, hm? Hey, I'm still human, I'm not immune to the occasional bout of shyness...
Fufu, well... here goes nothing~! It's okay to stare, that's one of the main purposes of the game, after all.
Fufu, I was still bested, even though I even made the effort to bluff... I guess I shouldn't have underestimated my opponents, hmm.
I was still bested, even though I even made the effort to bluff and everything~ How troublesome~
Oh, you're getting cold too, Rosa? I wouldn't mind it, especially with a girl as cute as you~
Ah, um, it's... a bit intimidating, I know. But you know what they say about sizes, right? It's more of a matter of knowing how to use it...
Ah, I know, it's a bit intimidating, but... fufu, I may not be the most experienced, but I know how to be careful and make it work... you know, in case you wanted to try...
Ehhh, do I look like that much of a troublemaker? I promise I'm a good boy~ I have no idea why you'd think I'm not, none at all...
Well, Yumenosaki did have a course for producers, too, so the focus isn't that narrow... I suppose it does sound unusual, though. And there's a lot of them too...

state.text: Oh... I wouldn't usually feel so embarrassed about this, but... {small}You did have quite an effect on me...

case.state: Hmm, well, would it be preposterous to offer you a ticket to one of my lives at this point? I do wonder if you'd like them... but I understand if you're too busy, of course~

state.text: And, well, I am a performer after all, and I can't deny I've taken a liking to you, so I do hope I don't... disappoint.

case.state: ...But, ~human~, now I'm curious... is what Nagatoro-chan says about you really true? Well, I guess it's not surprising, if you're playing a game like this...
It makes me wonder if I need to think more about the past sometimes... And I guess I probably do, but aren't the ends more important than the means?

state.text: Hm... you-sized, you said? Hmmm, does that mean you're... interested?
Eh--? I'm... I suppose I can't deny I feel a bit excited when it's... visible, can I? Well, Mari... I'm not trying to lose, but... you're certainly making the idea tempting.

case.state: Oh, almost? Are you really so sure? {small}Maybe you should come closer so we can compare more accurately...~
Perhaps you'll take a liking to the unit I lead, too? When I started it in high school, I decided on making its theme a "heavenly orchestra"...
What idea were you getting about my fans and money, hmmm~? Now you have my curiosity... I hope you're not planning on toying with me too much throughout the game~

state.text: Ehhh, what was that last part? I don't think I heard it right~ fufu, but if Natsuki-chan is happy, so am I, you know...
Hmm, did I sound lewd? Well, we're playing strip poker, I just mean I don't mind it if someone cheers me on while I undress. {small}And about my reputation... Well, I'm already here, right?
Ufufu, would you really be happy with just a... bookbag autograph? Well, if that's what you wish, of course I'll give it to you~
Fufu, well... I'm... happy to hear you think I'm sweet, Natsuki-chan. I do my best. (And now I have a mental image that I definitely won't forget about...)
Have I been a... delightful little tease, now? Mm, you're really trying to make me lose, aren't you... tapping into a performer's instinct to please like that. How unfair~
You... ah, I suppose there's no denying it if it's... visible, hm... But you've been having a hand in this too, teasing me like that, so you're partially responsible, you know?
Well, I'm happy you still want me here. And, well... fufu, if I may be bold, I'll have to say I may be trying to get your attention, just a little bit...
And, well, if I'm allowed to be a little bolder... I can't deny I've taken a liking to you, so I don't mind if this drags on for a bit longer...

case.state: You know, you're quite famous between my colleagues as well! Nobody can deny your group's unique charm~ It's the sort of work the industry really needs!
You should go a little easier on me, Mari-san~ It's not a good thing to pick on sick people, you know~
And if you can read my thoughts, anyway... Feeling excited doesn't mean I'm s-some kind of exhibitionist, though. I'm just having fun with the game like everyone else, right?
Oh, is that so? I wonder why you came here in uniform, then... Perhaps a vendetta against your old school? Fufu, I'm just teasing.
Hmmm, but I'm also a little more formal than most, so maybe that's actually normal? In that case, should I call you Yuno-chan? Or maybe Yuno-senpai, since you're a little older.
Fufu, did you catch that? See, I'm not that shy, even if I do have a bit of a weakness... I can only hope you won't exploit it too much, though~
Ehhh? Is it so shocking? But I can't really help it, you know... e-even though it's embarrassing.
Oh, don't worry about it. It's natural to get requests, being a performer. I do wonder if I could match your tastes in another way, though...
Oh, don't worry, there's nothing wrong about having a preference; You must really like these bands, hm? You got so excited talking about it~
It brings on the question if I should think more about the past, though... There are always things to learn from it. But to keep going ahead is what matters the most to me.
Having a lot of eyes on you can be uniquely stressful, you see. People are always expecting something from you, and you don't always know what it is...
Go on, stare all you want~ I wonder what you're thinking while you do it, though. Fufu, maybe you're wondering just how much this frail body can take before it breaks?
So, how do I look? If you don't know what to say, maybe you just have to look a little more...
So? Are my looks good enough for my job? Or, perhaps, you're thinking I just got it because I'm a pretty face...
Fufu, I'm rarely shy about my body, you know... I've been looked at in the nude plenty of times... by doctors, of course, what did you think I meant, ~pervert~?
Ooh, is there one certain ~pervert~ staring at me~?
Enjoying the show, ~pervert~? Don't think I can't notice it if you glance at me, even a little.
Giving me these looks... Come on, don't be so impatient. You all know that if you want me to take off more, you'll have to work for it~
If you're enjoying the view, you c-can... keep doing that... please.
Well, are any of you looking at me? Do you want to? ...I'm all yours, if that's the case...
All your eyes on me... it's no use to hide I'm hard already, is it... not that I'd even want to~
I think I might know what some of you are thinking-- "Just his shoes? And he's still keeping the socks on?" Sorry it's an unfortunate situation for you~
I could undo a couple buttons of my shirt... Emphasis on could.
Honestly, I don't like my build so much. So bony and frail looking... But I don't feel so much like that today. I wonder why~
You’re all rather skilled opponents, aren’t you? Managing to get me down… to my underwear…
It'd just be boring if I rushed into taking off bigger pieces. I think it's more rewarding this way. Besides, the shoes aren't very comfortable anyway...
Ah, I almost feel bad letting those socks touch the ground. I hope it's not dirty, their fabric is very delicate.
Fufu, I feel like I look sort of cozy like this, as if I came over to a friend's house, or something like that...
The sweater actually isn't part of the uniform, it was a gift from my grandmother I quite cherish. So I will very much be unhappy if it ends up damaged, just so you know~
I still wear this sweater often with my casuals, I really enjoy pieces like these. Though, maybe the half-unbuttoned shirt isn't a bad look on me either, what do you think?
Do I look better like this? I've heard from some of my acquaintances that sweater vests are "grandpa fashion"... but I've always worn a lot of them, even as a kid.
I just think I seem a bit too delicate, but... if you wish to look... I do hope my appearance isn't somehow disappointing.
I know I look a little too fragile... ah, I promise I'm just a little more durable than what I seem, though.
...Hm, is that disappointment I see? Surely you didn't think I'd start with a bigger item, did you? Do I really seem that easy?
...honestly, I'm not used to being barefoot at all. This feels quite strange.
Now I'm... completely exposed, in front of all these strangers... haa...
Um... if I may explain my predicament, I... may enjoy being watched a little too much.
...It's no use hiding it, so... If you want to enjoy the view, feel free to do so.
Fufu, sorry, that wasn't the most exciting strip, was it? Or maybe it was, for one of you... In that case, I'd like to hear what you found appealing about it.
Fufu, looks like it's our mysterious ~human~'s turn to strip. I wonder what he'll take off this round.
Oh, ~human~ has to strip. You've been so quiet... that means you're not too bothered by what's happening, right?
My, my, and to keep such a straight face when you know you're approaching risky territory... how commendable.
Fufu, ~human~'s turn to strip, yet he still seems so... balanced. Maybe you're what people call the "strong and silent" type, or something like that...
So, Mr. Dunban, wasn't it? I have to say you've caught my eye, I don't think I've seen you around here before. What do you do? I see you're carrying that sword with you...
So you call yourself "Cat Noir", hm? That sounds like it'd be quite the stage name... it definitely does suit your image well, if I say so myself.
Ah, Anatoly, you said you lived in a cabin with your friends, right? That you go foraging together? I wonder how that's like...
Huh, you know, Anatoly, you're actually really cool! Navigating the woods and befriending animals.. It sounds like something straight out of a game, or something like that!
You even said you could cook, too... You're making me blush and giggle like a schoolgirl~ And I'm even getting to watch you strip like this...
